actions.copyDeckShareCodeNotifyContent: Due to algorithm limitations, there is currently a small chance of generating an invalid sharing code. If you find an invalid share, please contact the maintainer (see footer), thank you for your help!
cards.numDecks: Calculated from {n} deck. | Calculated from {n} decks.
cards.numGames: Calculated from {n} game. | Calculated from {n} games.
footer.author: by gjfLeo
footer.suggestion: Feel free to offer any suggestions or corrections!
footer.text: Summoners' Summit: Tournament Match Database for GITCG
home.text: Welcome! The homepage is in development. Tap the navigation bar above to jump!
rules.conquestDescription: Any deck that wins a game cannot be selected again.
rules.duelDescription: Any deck used cannot be selected again.
rules.numCharacterBannedDescription: Each player ban {n} character card | Each player bans {n} character cards
rules.numCharactersRequiredDescription: Characters can be repeated in different decks, but at least {0} different characters are required.
rules.numDecksWithBanDescription: Both sides prepare {0} deck(s), then ban {1} of opponent's deck(s).
site.name: Summoners' Summit
stats.cardAveragePicksInAllDescription: Total pick count ÷ all game count
stats.cardAveragePicksInPick: Pick frequency in games containing this card
stats.cardAveragePicksInPickDescription: Total pick count ÷ game(contains at least one copy of this card) count
stats.cardPickRateDescription: Percentage of decks that include at least one copy of this card.
stats.cardPickWinRateDescription: Win rate of decks that include at least one copy of this card.
stats.characterPickRateDescription: Calculated by games, instead of conquest match.
team.allVersionGameListUnsupported: Game Record of all versions is unsupported. Please select a specific game version.
team.noGameWithDeck: There are no games with this deck in the available data.
team.noWinGameWithDeck: There are no games won with this deck in the available data.
team.numDecks: Calculated from {n} game with deck in available data. | Calculated from {n} games with deck in available data.
team.numDecksWin: Calculated from {n} win game with deck in available data. | Calculated from {n} win games with deck in available data.
teams.relationGraph.description: Based on the available data, for reference only.
